item.title: Hey, hey, hey, it's a new site!
item.description: After a few years of barely changing anything on my site, I’m super happy to finally build a whole new site! ðŸŽ‰ This site is powered by Hugo & Tailwind CSS . It’s been super fun to build, and I’m excited to finally get back to writing some blog posts. I’ve recently been updating a few of my other sites, and it feels good to use some sleek new tools to do it.
